```{r}
dhcb_health_medium.Scaled1<-dhcb_health_medium.Scaled[,-c(26,27,28,42,43,44)]
dim(dhcb_health_medium.Scaled1)
```


```{r}

wssplot <- function(data, nc=15, seed=3110){
  wss <- (nrow(data)-1)*sum(apply(data,2,var))
  for (i in 2:nc){
    set.seed(seed)
    wss[i] <- sum(kmeans(data, centers=i)$withinss)}
  plot(1:nc, wss, type="b", xlab="Number of Clusters",
       ylab="Within groups sum of squares")}

wssplot(dhcb_health_medium.Scaled1, nc=5)

sum(is.na(dhcb_health_medium.Scaled1))
```

```{r}
kmeans.clus = kmeans(x=dhcb_health_medium.Scaled1, centers = 4, nstart = 3)

dhcb_health_medium$Clusters <- kmeans.clus$cluster

aggr = aggregate(dhcb_health_medium[,-c(1,2,8,9,10,28,29,30,44,45,46)],list(dhcb_health_medium$Clusters),mean)

aggr


```

```{r}
write.csv(dhcb_health_medium,file="dhcb_health_medium_rmd.csv")

write.csv(aggr,file="dhcb_health_medium1_rmd.csv")
```
